data.title: : Beyond the Stars 5: Themes and Ideologies in American Popular Film, Edited by Paul Loukides and Linda K. Fuller, Popular Press
data.text:
Beyond the Stars 5

Themes and Ideologies in American Popular Film

Edited by Paul Loukides and Linda K. Fuller

Popular Press

The essays herein examine a small but important sample of the conventional themes and ideologies treated in popular film. Among the topics covered are family, social class, gender roles, politics, warfare, hedonism, and the 1960s. Taken singly or collectively, these essays suggest how certain themes and ideologies persist or evolve while others have only a brief life in movie consciousness.
